For people who can't get it work, follow this instruction carefully! 

1.) Install Lumion (No need to disable Internet connection)
2.)DO NOT start Lumion first.
3.)Go to the crack folder, copy it!
4.)NOW THIS IS THE MOST IMPORTANT PART! PASTE IT IN THE INSTALLATION DIRECTORIES! 

eg : C:/PROGRAMS FILES/LUMION

5.)Now patch it.
6.)This step is important too, you can use Windows Firewall to block lumion.exe (inbound and outbound) or any firewall software will do, just block the in/out connection.

7.) VOILAA! Enjoy your Lumion 3.0 :)

For those still having issues with the patch working, this might solve the issue if you are not seeing a gray "patch" button at the lower right of the graphic with the tree and the dog and the cracker info: go into your display settings through Control Panel and set the radio button for screen graphics to "Smaller-100%" instead of "Medium-125% (Default)" it will prompt you to log off; after logging back on, run patch as administrator and you should now see the "patch" button to click on and activate it. Follow all other install instructions as stated above. I think this problem is only Win 7 Ult and Win 8.  Hope this helps.
